posts.raw_content:
I have a paraganglioma in my neck.  It is a very rare non-cancerous tumor.  If left untreated, it can take your voice, inhibit swallowing, etc.  there is a small chance it can metastasize.  

I noticed about 5 years ago that my Adams Apple was increasingly misaligned.  It was about an inch off center.  I went to the doc for something unrelated, and the tumor was discovered.

ENT doc told me they used to do surgery as soon as they discovered them, but realized some people never have symptoms, and there are “much better treatment methods” now.  The surgery often left people voiceless.

The new treatment involved shooting lasers at me.  The lasers would end future symptoms but not any existing symptoms would continue.  And it was thousands of dollars and would require some level of treatment forever.

I thought about how the old treatment is now considered barbaric, and there is no reason to believe the current treatment would not be considered barbaric in 20 years.

A month ago symptoms started.  My voice was different.  I could feel it when I swallowed.  And I could see it easily in

I decided to try ivermectin since it is known to shrink tumors..  I bought a $99 three dose set.  Several hours after first dosage, I thought it seemed different.  

I took second dose on Friday.  

The tumor is gone.  My voice is back.  I can’t feel the tumor at all.  My Adams Apple is in perfect middle of my neck again.

Wow!
posts.author: top_eagle
posts.title: Ivermectin.
posts.content:
I have a paraganglioma in my neck. It is a very rare non-cancerous tumor. If left untreated, it can take your voice, inhibit swallowing, etc. there is a small chance it can metastasize.

I noticed about 5 years ago that my Adams Apple was increasingly misaligned. It was about an inch off center. I went to the doc for something unrelated, and the tumor was discovered.

ENT doc told me they used to do surgery as soon as they discovered them, but realized some people never have symptoms, and there are “much better treatment methods” now. The surgery often left people voiceless.

The new treatment involved shooting lasers at me. The lasers would end future symptoms but not any existing symptoms would continue. And it was thousands of dollars and would require some level of treatment forever.

I thought about how the old treatment is now considered barbaric, and there is no reason to believe the current treatment would not be considered barbaric in 20 years.

A month ago symptoms started. My voice was different. I could feel it when I swallowed. And I could see it easily in

I decided to try ivermectin since it is known to shrink tumors.. I bought a $99 three dose set. Several hours after first dosage, I thought it seemed different.

I took second dose on Friday.

The tumor is gone. My voice is back. I can’t feel the tumor at all. My Adams Apple is in perfect middle of my neck again.

Wow!
